name: .SCHEMATIC
summary: Learn about .SCHEMATIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open and edit SCHEMATIC files using a variety of Minecraft mod tools. Most notably, you can open SCHEMATIC files in MCEdit (Windows, Linux), which is a Minecraft saved game editor. To open a SCHEMATIC file in MCEdit, select the Import button while editing a level. You can also export a structure as a SCHEMATIC file by selecting Export Schematic after selecting the structure.

At the moment, there is no easy way to convert a Minecraft SCHEMATIC file to a SCHEM file. You can, however, convert SCHEM files to SCHEMATIC files, so the structures they contain can be used in pre-1.13 versions of Minecraft, using SchemToSchematic (Web) or Mineways (Windows).
